Html:
I'm new to Typescript. It looks compelling.

But I can't figure out how to create a .js file from my .ts files.

I'm using VS 2013.

I went into Properties -> Typescript. Told it to build on save and combine JavaScript output into file: site.js

Nothing happens.

Can someone please help???

Never mind.

Apparently, I have to select a module system.

Once I selected AMD I got the site.js file.
Please note that TypeScript has moved to github. please file new issues on the github issue tracker.
